```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
load(file="Input/SiteData_Daycent.RData")
DeltaC <- SiteData %>%
  select(Year,SiteName, Province,Ecodistrict, Area, deltaSOC)

# C input crop specific 
Ecodc <- read.csv("Input/CropC_Daycent/ecodcinputbycrop.csv") %>%
         select(ECODISTRIC, YEAR, CROPS, Province_ID, CInput_withRootExudates_t,Corrected_Area) %>% 
         filter(YEAR >= 1990) %>%
         filter(CROPS %in% c("BARLEY", "CANOLA","CORNSLG","CORNGR","RYEFAL","RYESPG","SOYBNS","SUGARB", "WHTDUR","WHTSPG","WHTWINT","DFPEAS","TRITCL", ))


Test <- Ecodc %>%
    filter(Province_ID == "AB", YEAR == "1990", ECODISTRIC == "244")

Test1 <- DeltaC %>%
    filter(Province == "AB", Year == "1990", Ecodistrict == "244")
```
